option.data-items-path: instance('vaccines')/root/item[name != if( /Child_Followup_Vaccination_Register/e_bcg != '', 'bcg' , '') and name != if( /Child_Followup_Vaccination_Register/e_opv0 != '', 'opv_0' , '') and name != if( /Child_Followup_Vaccination_Register/e_penta2 != '', 'pentavalent_2' , '') and name != if( /Child_Followup_Vaccination_Register/e_penta1 != '', 'pentavalent_1' , '') and name != if( /Child_Followup_Vaccination_Register/e_penta3 != '', 'pentavalent_3' , '') and name != if( /Child_Followup_Vaccination_Register/e_opv1 != '', 'opv_1' , '') and name != if( /Child_Followup_Vaccination_Register/e_opv2 != '', 'opv_2' , '') and name != if( /Child_Followup_Vaccination_Register/e_opv3 != '', 'opv_3' , '') and name != if( /Child_Followup_Vaccination_Register/e_pcv1 != '', 'pcv_1' , '') and name != if( /Child_Followup_Vaccination_Register/e_pcv2 != '', 'pcv_2' , '') and name != if( /Child_Followup_Vaccination_Register/e_pcv3 != '', 'pcv_3' , '') and name != if( /Child_Followup_Vaccination_Register/e_measles1 != '', 'measles_1' , '') and name != if( /Child_Followup_Vaccination_Register/e_measles2 != '', 'measles_2' , '')]

select.name: /Child_Followup_Vaccination_Register/vaccines_2
select.data-constraint: if(selected( /Child_Followup_Vaccination_Register/vaccines_2 , 'bcg') or selected( /Child_Followup_Vaccination_Register/vaccines_2 , 'opv_0') , .>= /Child_Followup_Vaccination_Register/existing_chid_dob and .<= /Child_Followup_Vaccination_Register/today , if(selected( /Child_Followup_Vaccination_Register/vaccines_2 , 'opv_1') or selected( /Child_Followup_Vaccination_Register/vaccines_2 , 'pentavalent_1'), .>= /Child_Followup_Vaccination_Register/six_weeks and .<= /Child_Followup_Vaccination_Register/today , if(selected( /Child_Followup_Vaccination_Register/vaccines_2 , 'opv_2') or selected( /Child_Followup_Vaccination_Register/vaccines_2 , 'pentavalent_2'), .>= /Child_Followup_Vaccination_Register/ten_weeks and .<= /Child_Followup_Vaccination_Register/today , if(selected( /Child_Followup_Vaccination_Register/vaccines_2 , 'opv_3') or selected( /Child_Followup_Vaccination_Register/vaccines_2 , 'pentavalent_3'), .>= /Child_Followup_Vaccination_Register/forteen_weeks and .<= /Child_Followup_Vaccination_Register/today , if(selected( /Child_Followup_Vaccination_Register/vaccines_2 , 'measles1'), .>= /Child_Followup_Vaccination_Register/nine_months and .<= /Child_Followup_Vaccination_Register/today , if(selected( /Child_Followup_Vaccination_Register/vaccines_2 , 'measles2'), .>= /Child_Followup_Vaccination_Register/fifteen_months and .<= /Child_Followup_Vaccination_Register/today ))))))

option.data-items-path: instance('vaccines')/root/item[name != if( /Child_Followup_Vaccination_Register/e_bcg != '', 'bcg' , '') and name != if( /Child_Followup_Vaccination_Register/e_opv0 != '', 'opv_0' , '') and name != if( /Child_Followup_Vaccination_Register/e_penta2 != '', 'pentavalent_2' , '') and name != if( /Child_Followup_Vaccination_Register/e_penta1 != '', 'pentavalent_1' , '') and name != if( /Child_Followup_Vaccination_Register/e_penta3 != '', 'pentavalent_3' , '') and name != if( /Child_Followup_Vaccination_Register/e_opv1 != '', 'opv_1' , '') and name != if( /Child_Followup_Vaccination_Register/e_opv2 != '', 'opv_2' , '') and name != if( /Child_Followup_Vaccination_Register/e_opv3 != '', 'opv_3' , '') and name != if( /Child_Followup_Vaccination_Register/e_pcv1 != '', 'pcv_1' , '') and name != if( /Child_Followup_Vaccination_Register/e_pcv2 != '', 'pcv_2' , '') and name != if( /Child_Followup_Vaccination_Register/e_pcv3 != '', 'pcv_3' , '') and name != if( /Child_Followup_Vaccination_Register/e_measles1 != '', 'measles_1' , '') and name != if( /Child_Followup_Vaccination_Register/e_measles2 != '', 'measles_2' , '')]

input.name: /Child_Followup_Vaccination_Register/vaccination_date
input.data-constraint: if(selected( /Child_Followup_Vaccination_Register/vaccines_2 , 'bcg') or selected( /Child_Followup_Vaccination_Register/vaccines_2 , 'opv_0') , .>= /Child_Followup_Vaccination_Register/existing_chid_dob and .<= /Child_Followup_Vaccination_Register/today , if(selected( /Child_Followup_Vaccination_Register/vaccines_2 , 'opv_1') or selected( /Child_Followup_Vaccination_Register/vaccines_2 , 'pentavalent_1'), .>= /Child_Followup_Vaccination_Register/six_weeks and .<= /Child_Followup_Vaccination_Register/today , if(selected( /Child_Followup_Vaccination_Register/vaccines_2 , 'opv_2') or selected( /Child_Followup_Vaccination_Register/vaccines_2 , 'pentavalent_2'), .>= /Child_Followup_Vaccination_Register/ten_weeks and .<= /Child_Followup_Vaccination_Register/today , if(selected( /Child_Followup_Vaccination_Register/vaccines_2 , 'opv_3') or selected( /Child_Followup_Vaccination_Register/vaccines_2 , 'pentavalent_3'), .>= /Child_Followup_Vaccination_Register/forteen_weeks and .<= /Child_Followup_Vaccination_Register/today , if(selected( /Child_Followup_Vaccination_Register/vaccines_2 , 'measles1'), .>= /Child_Followup_Vaccination_Register/nine_months and .<= /Child_Followup_Vaccination_Register/today , if(selected( /Child_Followup_Vaccination_Register/vaccines_2 , 'measles2'), .>= /Child_Followup_Vaccination_Register/fifteen_months and .<= /Child_Followup_Vaccination_Register/today ))))))

label.span: بچہ پیدائش پرکسی مرض میں مبطلع تھا: {existing_child_was_suffering_from_a_disease_at_birth}$
Child was suffering from a disease at birth:
The temporary side-effects of immunization shots AEFI
کیا آپ اپنے بچے کی اگلی ویکسین کی تاریخ کے بارے میں SMS موصول کرنا چاہیں گے؟ {existing_reminders_approval}$
Are you willing to receive sms reminders for your next visit?
